resources.string: Sorry, the service is not available

The first online motorcycle taxi service in Bangladesh since 2017.

 Dhaka Riders is ready to take you anywhere, anytime quickly.

 Starting in 2017 as a two-wheeler transportation company by phone call, Dhaka Riders has now grown to become a leading on-demand mobile platform and application that provides a full range of services ranging from transportation, logistics, payment, food delivery, and various services on -demand.

The hotline number of our dhaka rider is as follows:
